data.description: a POE wrapper for the musicus audio player
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module accomplishes the same goal as
    POE::Component::Player::MPG123, but for a different player app with
    a different interface. This makes the namespace choice pretty easy.
    The module allows a POE application to easily manipulate the musicus
    commandline audio player. This player supports most any format that
    an XMMS input plugin exists for and was designed for integration
    with other programs. So, by using this module it isn't very
    difficult to create a POE application that can play most any kind of
    audio file out there.
